inclusion.criterion: liver biopsy, are consented to phase II, and do not have known CAD defined as prior
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI) or coronary artery bypass graft (CABG) or have
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: not undergone CCTA within the previous 12 months, will undergo a CCTA with CAC score.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: greater or equal to 5% steatosis on MRI
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: liver stiffness greater than 7 kPa on Fibroscan®
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of CAD, CVA, and PVD. He is referred to cardiology for evaluation of PVD. The patient reports occasional dizziness and denies chest pain, dyspnea on exertion, paroxysmal nocturnal dyspnea, orthopnea, palpitations, syncope or presyncope.
